title: Limits of animal models in study of human health

content.question: The risk that many cancer-causing chemicals pose to humans can be estimated using laboratory tests on rats. A significant scientific limitation of such tests is that

choices.label: they take several decades to conduct
they are banned in the United States
animal models may not reflect human responses
the test animals may be killed as a result of the tests

content.answer: animal models may not reflect human responses
